text: Ernesto Maguengue (born 2 August 1964) is a Mozambican clergyman, who is the Auxiliary Bishop of Nampula. He was ordained as a priest on 14 May 1989 in Maputo. On 24 June 2004 he was appointed Bishop of Pemba, which came into effect on 14 November, until his resignation on 27 October 2012. On 6 August 2014 Maguengue was appointed Auxiliary Bishop of Nampula and Titular Bishop of Furnos Minor. ==References== Category:Mozambican Roman Catholic bishops Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gaza Province Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ernesto Maguengue
